Query.GetArticulos: SELECT TOP 10 AR_CODART,AR_DESART FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1
Query.SearchArticulos: SELECT TOP 10 AR_CODART,AR_DESART FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1 AND AR_DESART LIKE '%{0}%' OR AR_CODART LIKE '%{0}%'
Query.GetStockArticulos: SELECT AR_CODART,AR_DESART, AR_UNIMED, STOCK = (ISNULL ((SELECT SUM(sd1_entrad-sd1_salida) FROM vw_1039_stbd WHERE sd1_codart = AR_CODART),0)) FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1
Query.GetStockArticulo: SELECT AR_CODART,AR_DESART, AR_UNIMED, STOCK = (ISNULL ((SELECT SUM(sd1_entrad-sd1_salida) FROM vw_1039_stbd WHERE sd1_codart = AR_CODART),0)) FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1 AND AR_CODART = '{0}'
Query.GetStockArticulosEnBodega: SELECT AR_CODART,AR_DESART, AR_UNIMED, STOCK = (ISNULL ((SELECT SUM(sd1_entrad-sd1_salida) FROM vw_1039_stbd WHERE sd1_codart = AR_CODART AND sd1_codbod IN ({0})),0) ) FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1
Query.GetStockArticuloEnBodega: SELECT AR_CODART,AR_DESART, AR_UNIMED, STOCK = (ISNULL ((SELECT SUM(sd1_entrad-sd1_salida) FROM vw_1039_stbd WHERE sd1_codart = AR_CODART AND sd1_codbod IN ({0})),0) ) FROM MAEART WHERE AR_ACTIVO = 1 AND AR_CODART = '{1}'
Query.GetBodegas: SELECT tb_codtab, tb_destab FROM MAETAB WHERE tb_tiptab = 18 AND tb_codtab < > 0
